summary.Summary:
I graduated from the University of Pennsylvania with a Bachelors of Science in Engineering majoring
 in Computer Science. I also extensively pursued coursework in Finance, Operations Research and
 Information Management. 

My research interests include Graph Algorithms, Deterministic Reputation Systems, Qualitative
 ranking in Social Networks and applications of predictive modelling in Securities Pricing.

I'm currently working in Google NYC as a part of

 class of around 20 students, grading exams and assignments, holding weekly office hours as well
 as assisting the professor in developing course material as an when required.

as a part of their Social Data Infrastructure team. I worked

 MapReduce programming model. Additionally worked to develop a Workflow management system
 for the team’s periodic batch data processing jobs.
